document_data.name: River Square
document_data.mainbody: '''River Square''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] courtyard in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This courtyard opened from the east off of [[Salabar Street]] and opened from the north on to an unnamed alley.

Notable Locations.Felzoun's Folly: a tavern that stood on the northeastern corner where River Square opened onto [[Salabar Street]].
